name: Crystal and Glassware Stores

description:
Merchants that sell glassware, china, and crystal for table service use
(such as wine and champagne glasses, serving bowls, and plates), as
well as gift items (such as figurines, book ends, flower vases, jewelry
boxes, and candlestick holders).
